# script to generate `data/hampi.rda`, an `sc` version of `dodgr::hampi` (in `sf`)

```{r load, echo = FALSE}
library (osmdata)
```
```{r}
m4ra_hampi <- opq ("hampi india") %>%
    add_osm_feature (key = "highway") %>%
    osmdata_sc (quiet = FALSE)
```
```{r}
usethis::use_data (m4ra_hampi, overwrite = TRUE, compress = 'xz')
```
